header.title: The best Fence & Concrete installation company in Los Altos
bullets: Fast, responsive and friendly customer service from start to finish.
FREE custom fence quotes that you can create and review online!
Transparent pricing so you know exactly what you’re getting.
Quality Fence & Concrete craftsmanship delivered by skilled contractors.

Yelp.description: Ergeon did a first class job of replacing an old 72' fence with a well-built and attractive price at a very competitive price. All of the Ergeon people I dealt with were very professional and friendly. Would strongly recommend them for any fence construction project.
Yelp.name: Richard N.
Yelp.title: All of the Ergeon people I dealt with were very professional and friendly.

Google.description: Ergeon removed an existing 72’ wood fence and replaced with a new one. The fence is well constructed and quite attractive. The cost was very competitive with a number of other bids I received. All of the Ergeon personnel with whom I dealt were professional and friendly. I would strongly recommend hiring Ergeon for any fence construction project.
Google.name: Richard N.
Google.title: All of the Ergeon personnel with whom I dealt were professional and friendly.

regulations.title: Permits & Regulations
regulations.description: See the undefined Permits & Regulations for undefined

faq.side-yard: 4 feet within 5 feet fence setback, 6 feet + 2 feet lattice (50% open) beyond fence setback & interior side yard
faq.corner-lot-rules: 3 feet max on 25 feet Visibility Triangle Area. The city planner may approve an exception to allow the exterior side yard of a corner lot to be considered the front yard, and adjust the other yard orientations accordingly, for the purposes of fencing. This exception may be granted only when it is clear that this alternative orientation is consistent with the orientation of the home itself.

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.
